parts.text: {"word":"deponer","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(法律)証言する、供述する","english_definition":"(law) to depose; to testify under oath","examples":[{"sentence":"El testigo depondrá ante el juez.","translation":"The witness will depose before the judge.","english_translation":"その証人は裁判官の前で証言するだろう。"}],"collocations":["deponer como testigo (証人として証言する)","deponer bajo juramento (宣誓して証言する)"],"synonyms":["testificar","declarar","atestiguar"],"antonyms":["retractarse","negar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(権力、地位などを)退かせる、免じる","english_definition":"to depose; to remove from office or power","examples":[{"sentence":"El rey fue depuesto por el golpe de estado.","translation":"The king was deposed by the coup d'état.","english_translation":"王はクーデターによって退位させられた。"}],"collocations":["deponer a un rey (王を退位させる)","deponer a un funcionario (官僚を免じる)"],"synonyms":["destituir","derrocar","remover"],"antonyms":["ascender","investir"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「deponere」（置く、預ける、手放す）に由来。de-（下へ、離れて）+ ponere（置く）から構成される。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/depoˈneɾ/","syllables":"de-po-ner"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["depongo","depones","depone","deponemos","deponéis","deponen"],"past_simple":"depuse","depusiste","depuso","depusimos","depusisteis","depusieron"},"notes":"スペイン語の動詞であり、活用はスペイン語の規則に従う。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「Deponer」は主に法律用語として使われ、「証言する」または「供述する」という意味を持ちます。また、「（権力、地位などを）退かせる」という意味もあります。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo depono mi carro.","correct":"Yo dejo mi carro.","note":"「deponer」は「置く」という意味では通常使われず、「dejar」がより一般的。"},{"incorrect":"El presidente deponó su cargo voluntariamente.","correct":"El presidente renunció a su cargo voluntariamente.","note":"自発的に辞任する場合は「renunciar」がより適切。"}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["deposición (証言、供述、退位)","deponente (証言者、供述者)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C1","frequency_google_ngram":"低頻度","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「Deponer」は、法律や政治の文脈で使われる、やや形式ばった単語です。主に「証言する」または「（権力などを）退かせる」という意味で使用されます。日常会話ではあまり使われません。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"El acusado se negó a deponer ante el tribunal.","translation":"被告は法廷での証言を拒否した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"証言する"},{"sentence":"La asamblea decidió deponer al dictador.","translation":"議会は独裁者を退位させることを決定した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"退かせる"}]}
